content: olly octopus supplies notes this pattern is 7mm hook designed as a super bulky blanket snuggler it does not or chenille style yarn require stuffing yarn needle though it will easily scissors convert to a stuffie abbreviations this design is written in us crochet terms magic_ring = magic_ring and worked in r = round continuous rounds single_crochet = single_crochet half_double_crochet = half double crochet slip_stitch = slip_stitch chain = chain body and head r1 6sc in magic_ring 6 r2 increase x6 12 r3 increase x12 24 r4-5 single_crochet around 24 two rounds total r6 2sc decrease x6 18 r7-8 single_crochet around 18 two rounds total r9 single_crochet decrease x2 3hdc bobble single_crochet 3hdc bobble single_crochet decrease x3 13 if using safety eyes insert now into the sides of the bobble stitches r10 3sc decrease x5 8 ****next round is half_double_crochet only **** r11 increase x8 16 do not fasten_off if you want to make a stuffed version stuff now arms the arms are worked directly off the last round of the body **tip** when working back up the chain allow it to spin it is not important to keep the chain straight as the chain moving gives the arms their curls ch16 working back up the chain add 5sl st 5sc 5hdc sl slt into the next st to join slip_stitch into the next st and repeat this process for the remaining seven arms fasten_off cut the yarn and weave in the end ** stuffed version use the yarn end to cinch the centre hole closed **
